title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Special Edition of Open Line Friday with special guest Kathryn Limbaugh presenting the first-ever Rush Limbaugh Great American Business Award. Kathryn on how she and Rush both learned the value of hard work as kids. Rush and Kathryn were inspired to start the Great American Business Awards when covid started taking out so many great small businesses. The kinship between Rush and President Trump around entrepreneurship and connection with ordinary Americans. Kathryn introduces and talks with the finalists: Andres Diaz - PMI Summit (Cedar Hills, UT), Raul Bonilla - Salsa Revolution (Northlake, TX), Sheri Nielsen - Twisted Beeswax Candles (Peoria, AZ), Jason Bast - Forever Barnwood (Stillwater, MN), Sheila Blue - Victory Pie Company (Magnolia, TX), Joey Norris - RJ Transportation (Aiken, SC).

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Kathryn continues with Rush Limbaugh Great American Business Award finalists: Joey Norris - RJ Transportation (Aiken, SC), Bob Waters - Pure Harmoni (Columbia, NC), Lindsay LiCausi - Back the Blue NC (Franklinton, NC), Christine Price - Laser Life Outdoors (Alapaha, GA), Mark Menendez - Menendez Art Studios (Zephyrhills, FL). Kathryn announces the first recipient of the Rush Limbaugh Great American Business Award: Andres Diaz - PMI Summit (Cedar Hills, UT). Andres receives a $25,000 grant from Rush and Kathryn. The Biden press conference, the day after. Montage of Biden talking about Trump. New Hunter Biden scandal. Montage of media fawning over Biden press conference.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Biden is lying about the border. Rush on how the Washington Establishment has always wanted open borders -- only the American people have stopped them. Caller on Hunter Biden. Rush on how Democrats play games with the election. Rush on how Democrats want to eliminate elections. Where's the Hunter Biden news? Hunter lied about his drug past on his gun permit. D.C. statehood is unconstitutional.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
